Code: EXEC SQL SELECT T1.SITUACAO, T2.NUM_APOL_SINISTRO, T2.COD_AGENCIA, T2.NUM_CONTRATO, T2.DV_CONTRATO FROM SEGUROS.V0MESTSINI T1, SEGUROS.V0MESTSINI T2 WHERE T2.COD_AGENCIA = :COD_AGENCIA AND T2.NUM_CONTRATO = :NUM_CONTRATO AND T2.DV_CONTRATO = :DV_CONTRATO AND T1.NUM_APOL_SINISTRO = T2.NUM_APOL_SINISTRO AND T1.SITUACAO <> '2' END SQL
